block.p: Susan Louise Amble, a daughter of Joan C. Amble and David G. Amble of Darien, Conn., was married last evening to Michael Francis Higgins, a son of Jacquelyn M. Higgins and James F. Higgins of Ho Ho Kus, N.J. The Rev. Leo J. O'Donovan, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. John Church in Darien.
The couple met at Princeton, from which they graduated, she summa cum laude.

Susan Louise Amble, a daughter of Joan C. Amble and David G. Amble of Darien, Conn., was married last evening to Michael Francis Higgins, a son of Jacquelyn M. Higgins and James F. Higgins of Ho Ho Kus, N.J. The Rev. Leo J. Oâ€™Donovan, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. John Church in Darien.

Susan Louise Amble, a daughter of Joan C. Amble and David G. Amble of Darien, Conn., was married last evening to Michael Francis Higgins, a son of Jacquelyn M. Higgins and James F. Higgins of Ho Ho Kus, N.J. The Rev. Leo J. O'Donovan, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. John Church in Darien.
The couple met at Princeton, from which they graduated, she summa cum laude.
The bride, 25, is a litigation associate in the New York office of Covington & Burling, the Washington law firm. She received her law degree from Harvard.

Her father works in Stamford, Conn., as the chief operating officer of the equipment services unit of General Electric; the unit provides leasing and asset-management services for commercial and transportation equipment. Her mother is an executive vice president and the controller of American Express in New York.
The bridegroom, 28, is a stock trader at Goldman, Sachs & Company in New York. He received an M.B.A. from Harvard.

His mother is on the board of the Connie Dwyer Breast Center at St. Michael's Medical Center, a breast cancer treatment center in Newark. His father retired as president and chief operating officer of the global wealth management group at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York.
